REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f1218 reute b f BC-EC-AWARDS-EXPORT-LICE 04-02 0062

TEXT.TITLE: EC SETS EXPORT LICENCES ON 20,000 TONNES MAIZE
TEXT.BODY: The European Community Commission awarded export licences for 20,000 tonnes free market French maize at a maximum export rebate of 129.40 European currency units (Ecus) per tonne, trade sources said here. All requests for export licences for free market feed wheat and barley were rejected, they said. Reuter
